WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 010400Z APR
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 7408 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-46.55S 042-11.03W, 25-42.43S 041-40.10W,
   25-48.51S 041-53.39W, 24-47.01S 042-27.32W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 959/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 010500Z APR 17.
